## Penguin Size and Mass by Sex and Species



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- palmerpenguins::penguins%>% drop_na()
df %>%
  group_by(species, sex) %>%
  summarise(
    across(
      where(is.numeric), 
      \(x) mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)
      )
    ) %>%
  knitr::kable()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
|species   |sex    | bill_length_mm| bill_depth_mm| flipper_length_mm| body_mass_g|     year|
|:---------|:------|--------------:|-------------:|-----------------:|-----------:|--------:|
|Adelie    |female |       37.25753|      17.62192|          187.7945|    3368.836| 2008.055|
|Adelie    |male   |       40.39041|      19.07260|          192.4110|    4043.493| 2008.055|
|Chinstrap |female |       46.57353|      17.58824|          191.7353|    3527.206| 2007.971|
|Chinstrap |male   |       51.09412|      19.25294|          199.9118|    3938.971| 2007.971|
|Gentoo    |female |       45.56379|      14.23793|          212.7069|    4679.741| 2008.069|
|Gentoo    |male   |       49.47377|      15.71803|          221.5410|    5484.836| 2008.066|
:::
:::


## Penguin Size vs Mass by Species



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df = df %>%
  mutate(colour = case_when(
    (species == "Adelie") ~ "#ff7400",
    (species == "Chinstrap") ~ "#c35ccc",
    (species == "Gentoo") ~ "#057275",
    TRUE ~ "",
  ))

df %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, colour=colour)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  scale_color_manual(values = levels(factor(df$colour, levels=c("#ff7400", "#c35ccc", "#057275"))), 
                   labels = c("Adelie","Chinstrap","Gentoo")) +
                   theme_bw()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](eda_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
